author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Attempt to resolve https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/35670 by decoupling writing legacy and HLT `BeamSpotOnline` payloads on same sqlite file.

#### PR validation:

Unit test (still) run. 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: decouple writing legacy and HLT payloads on same sqlite file in `CondTools/BeamSpot` tests
